page.title: 09Village Shop
page.content: The village shop is a very important part of our village.The older members of the village rely on it for their groceries.The shop has a post office.It sells groceries,sweets,ice lollies and ice cream,stationary,batteries,small torches,cooked meats,cream,milk,cheese, butter,cigarettes,matches,wines and spirits and a lot more.Mr.John Ottiwell is the owner of the shop and he has made it the best village shop we have had for years.My family uses it alot. The shop is situated at the bottom of The Square.Late night openings are Tuesday and Friday and early closing days are Wednesday and Sunday.The things are very reasonably priced.I think it is a very good shop.
